thread.title: WSP: Students safe after school bus accident
thread.title_full: WSP: Students safe after school bus accident | www.kirotv.com

author: KIRO 7 STAFF
title: WSP: Students safe after school bus accident
text:
A school bus driver tried to avoid a two-truck crash in Snohomish County on Wednesday, but the bus ended up hitting one of the two pickups involved.
According to the Washington State Patrol, one pickup was reversing out of a driveway when it hit an oncoming truck. Then the bus came along, resulting in a three-vehicle crash.
It happened in the Trafton area, which is near Arlington.
The Arlington School District says the kids are safe. A driver of one of the pickup trucks has a minor injury.
